value.title: Using Single Sign-on with the Power BI Gateway

value.title: What does Tooltip Auto-scale actually do in your Power BI Report?
value.excerpt: Is your tooltip going off the page of your Power BI report? Maybe it looks weird on an iPad or smaller device. Adam shows how the new tooltip auto-scale feature can help. value.title: What is a Power BI tenant? (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at what a Power BI tenant is. This is really the Azure Active Directory / Office 365 tenant that contains your users, groups, subscriptions and more. value.title: What's the real size of your data model in Power BI?

value.title: Why isn't my Agg hitting when using DISTINCTCOUNT in Power BI???

Get ready for some DAX fusion!  DAX Fusion: https://dax.tips/2019/08/05/dax-fusion/  Aggregations Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/aggregations-advanced
